Text: i just tried this and it show pending earned $37.24 after couple hours doing this. Are they really paying?

yes, it's just once a month tough, i remembered joined them last year, but quit after couple months trying. I don't like doing survey from home tough i earn couple hundred dollars each month. I prefer real job. Go for real job it's a lot better and more fun.

THIS FILE IS A FAKE! This is not the real book, it's some crappy work from home survey crap that's three pages long. The author is just trying to get people to sign up under his name so he can get referral money.

Although I must applaud the uploader, pretty clever.
